name: @snowball-tech/fractal
description: Fractal's (Snowball's design system) React component library based on RadixUI and PandaCSS
author: Snowball Engineering Team <engineering@snowball.xyz> (https://github.com/orgs/snowball-tech)

scripts.prebuild:storybook: NODE_ENV=production yarn run -T turbo run update:fonts build:code build:styles --filter=@snowball-tech/fractal --parallel
scripts.build:storybook: yarn run prebuild:storybook && NODE_ENV=production yarn storybook build
scripts.build: yarn run prebuild && yarn run -T turbo build:code build:info build:styles build:library --filter=@snowball-tech/fractal --parallel
scripts.build:library: NODE_ENV=production yarn tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && echo 'Component library successfully built!'
scripts.build:code: NODE_ENV=production yarn panda codegen && echo 'Panda code successfully generated!'
scripts.build:info: yarn run prebuild:info && NODE_ENV=production yarn panda ship --outfile dist/fractal.buildinfo.json && echo 'Panda build info successfully generated!'
scripts.build:styles: yarn run prebuild:styles && NODE_ENV=production yarn panda cssgen && yarn run postbuild:styles && echo 'Panda static styles successfully generated!'
scripts.postbuild:styles: mv node_modules/@snowball-tech/fractal-panda/styles.css dist/fractal.css && cp node_modules/@snowball-tech/fractal-panda/global.css dist/global.css && (mkdir -p dist/tokens >/dev/null 2>&1 || true) && cp node_modules/@snowball-tech/fractal-panda/tokens/index.css dist/tokens/index.css
scripts.predev: yarn run -T turbo run update:fonts build:code --filter=@snowball-tech/fractal
scripts.dev: yarn run predev && yarn storybook dev -p 6006 --no-open
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:scripts && yarn run lint:styles
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:scripts:fix && yarn run lint:styles:fix
scripts.lint:scripts: yarn run prelint:scripts && yarn run -T eslint --cache .
scripts.lint:scripts:fix: yarn run prelint:scripts && yarn run -T eslint --cache --fix .
scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn run -T turbo run build:code --filter=@snowball-tech/fractal
